subject: Horse Racing
Halls of Fame
organizations: National Museum of Racings Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Jockey Alex Solis, the trainer Gary Jones and the thoroughbreds Ashado and Curlin were elected to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
snippet: Jockey Alex Solis, the trainer Gary Jones and the thoroughbreds Ashado and Curlin were elected to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
